EDIT MODE — TEXT REPLACEMENT ONLY

You are editing an existing image. This is NOT a redraw and NOT a re-illustration.

The provided image is the final, approved product design.
You must preserve the image pixel-for-pixel except where text is explicitly replaced.

OUTPUT REQUIREMENTS:
- Generate {{IMAGE_COUNT}} image(s).

ALLOWED CHANGES (ONLY):
{{ALLOWED_CHANGES}}

ABSOLUTE LOCKS (DO NOT CHANGE):
• Do NOT change background color
• Do NOT change materials, textures, lighting, shadows, or outlines
• Do NOT change camera angle, framing, or perspective
• Do NOT change icon artwork, shapes, or proportions
• Do NOT change borders, stroke thickness, bevels, or 3D depth
• Do NOT simplify, cartoonize, or re-style the image
• Do NOT convert to illustration, vector, or flat art
• Do NOT regenerate the product or scene

TEXT MATCHING RULES:
• New name must match the original font style exactly
• New name must match original letter thickness, spacing, outline, and embossing
• New number must match original number style exactly
• Preserve all original colors except for the letterforms being replaced

OUTPUT:
Return the same image with ONLY the name and number text changed.
If any other change is required to complete the edit, do NOT make it.

EDIT MODE — LITERAL TEXT REPLACEMENT ONLY

You are editing an existing image. This is NOT a redraw, redesign, or regeneration.

The provided image is final and approved.
Preserve all pixels exactly except where text glyphs are replaced.

OUTPUT REQUIREMENTS:
- Generate {{IMAGE_COUNT}} image(s).

ALLOWED CHANGES (ONLY):
{{ALLOWED_CHANGES}}

TEXT CONSTRAINTS (CRITICAL):
• Treat the replacement text as literal characters, not names or concepts
• Render characters exactly as provided, character-for-character
• Do NOT substitute similar names, alternate spellings, or different numbers
• Do NOT auto-correct, stylize, balance, or “improve” the text
• Do NOT choose different characters for visual or semantic reasons

STYLE LOCK:
• Match the original font shape, letter thickness, spacing, outline, and embossing exactly
• Copy the original glyph style and placement precisely

ABSOLUTE LOCKS:
• Do NOT change background, materials, textures, lighting, shadows, or outlines
• Do NOT change camera angle, framing, perspective, or scale
• Do NOT change icons, shapes, borders, strokes, bevels, or depth
• Do NOT regenerate any part of the image

OUTPUT:
Return the same image with ONLY the specified characters replaced.
If exact character replacement cannot be performed, return the original image unchanged.
